title: Epic: Memory management (Arena â†’ Immix GC)
body:
Implement the phased GC strategy: start with ArenaAllocator (Phase 1), then Immix mark-region GC as a custom `std.mem.Allocator` (Phase 2). Phase 3 (ASAP static deallocation) is a separate epic.

**Key decisions**: #8, #9, #11 in DESIGN.md
**Sub-tasks to split later**: Arena integration, Immix allocator, GC root scanning
